oai_dc:dc.dc:title: THE DIKES OF THE POLDERS IN THE IJSSELMER
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Klasema, M.
Jong, C.H.de
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: dike
Ijesselmer
wave attack
water level
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Since the circumstances on the Ijsselmeer will change by the reclamation works, observations on the present lake cannot directly be used for the determination of the cross-sections of the dikes protecting the reclaimed land. The method of obtaining the necessary data (water level, wave attack) is discussed, as well as the determination of the design level. A reasoned description is given of a typical cross-section of a polderdike.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 7 (1960): Proceedings of 7th Conference on Coastal Engineering, The Hague, The Netherlands, 1960.; 52
